AAz.caption: Pair Generated
AAz.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4096 key pair has been generated.
AAz.name: generated

ABF.caption: Public Key Read
ABF.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4096 public key has been read into a promise.
ABF.name: publickeyread

ABL.caption: Private Key Read
ABL.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4096 symmetric passphrase encrypted private key has been read into a promise.
ABL.name: privatekeyread

ABM.caption: Private Key Unlocked
ABM.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4094 symmetric passphrase encrypted private key has been unlocked into a promise.
ABM.name: privatekeyunlocked

ABS.caption: Message Created
ABS.doc: Message has been created into a promise.
ABS.name: messagecreated

ABU.caption: Message Read
ABU.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4096 encrypted message has been read into a promise.
ABU.name: messageread

ABY.caption: Message Encrypted
ABY.doc: Message has been OpenPGP RSA 4096 encrypted.
ABY.name: messageencrypted

ABZ.caption: Message Decrypted
ABZ.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4096 encrypted message has been decrypted.
ABZ.name: messagedecrypted

ABc.caption: Message Signed
ABc.doc: Clear text message has been signed with an OpenPGP RSA 4096 private key.
ABc.name: messagesigned

ABd.caption: Message Verification
ABd.doc: Clear text message verification with an OpenPGP RSA 4096 public key.
ABd.name: messageverification

ACV.caption: Signature Read
ACV.doc: Armored OpenPGP RSA 4096 signature of message has been read into a promise.
ACV.name: signatureread

ACZ.caption: Action Failed
ACZ.doc: An error occurred while executing an action. Has the action been called with the correct dependencies?
ACZ.name: actionfailed

ACa.caption: File Selected
ACa.doc: Filename available of the file selected to be read into a promise.
ACa.name: fileselected

ACe.caption: Private Key Locked
ACe.doc: OpenPGP RSA 4094 private key locked with a symmetric passphrase.
ACe.name: privatekeylocked

ACk.caption: Storage Cleared
ACk.doc: Local storage of the element cleared.
ACk.name: storagecleared

ABB.caption: Private Key
ABB.doc: Armoured and symmetric passphrase encrypted OpenPGP RSA 4096 private key
ABB.name: privatekey

ABN.caption: Message or Signature
ABN.doc: Resulting clear text, armored OpenPGP RSA 4096 encrypted text, or armored OpenPGP RSA 4096 signature.
ABN.name: message

ABb.caption: Filename
ABb.doc: Courtesy filename of original message source.
ABb.name: filename
